title: Does Federal Transit Funding Improve Local Labor Markets? \\ Evidence from a Population ThresholdThis paper is a revision of APEP-0049. See https://github.com/SocialCatalystLab/auto-policy-evals/tree/main/papers/apep_0049 for the original. (v2)
revision_rationale: Critical code integrity issues (fabricated first-stage data) and reviewer concerns about timing, literature, and length
